about_the_game:
What are the real desires deep down of various beauties? By talking and fighting, you will get to know the weaknesses of some of their personalities, which will help you getting to know the deepest desire inside of your girlfriends and those you're trying to pursue.

You can analyze the six heroines and learn about the innermost needs ofthem that are not known to you in the story dialogue. You may hate or love these six heroines, and in here you can train them, cherish them and understand them.

There are many different kinds of personalities, some are easily to be seen, while others can only be found through understanding.

Put down the pride and prejudice and pick up the sincerity and honesty.
This ia a one-man indie game studio, and hope to always bring you a different game experience.
Making games is to provide services, and I hope to serve you with more games!

Game features.
This Game is a combination of "beautiful girls + item pickup + RPG".
Adopt the traditional pattern of item pick-up in mini-games, but it adds the "skill" that can alter the battle result.
Each heroine has her own unique skills.
The game has some plot options that will affect the ending of the beauties, and each character has two ending settings and several CGs.

content_descriptors.notes: Text or images may contain adult content. There is no violent sexual assault or non-consensual sex. There is no sexual intercourse on display, only adult pictures and props to tune in.

name: Ninehouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz或以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB RAM以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz或以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB RAM以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: This game combines "beautiful girls with item pickup and GALGAME". You will analyze a variety of beauties in an other world, and find the weaknesses of their personalities by fighting and talking, which will help you understand the deepest desire of your girlfriends and girls you're pursuing.
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
